title: AUTHME插件your country is banned.(你的国家在服务器被禁止)求解
txt_content:
我只找到一种临时的办法
就是在authme文件夹里的config.yml在最后吧countryblacklist下面的删掉。
但是开启服务器之后他又会冒出来一个A1.使很多玩家无法进入

求万能解决法！！！！求大神！！

replies.txt_content:
914554688wyt 发表于 2015-5-31 20:52
把这一栏设置countryBlacklist: []
这样之后，国家ban问题是解决了，但是，登陆不需要密码了。直接登陆！！！怎么办

replies.author: ttc_V
replies.txt_content:
我的也是172的我的配置如下你复制粘贴就OK
DataSource:
  mySQLColumnName: username
  mySQLTablename: authme
  mySQLUsername: authme
  backend: file
  mySQLColumnLastLogin: lastlogin
  mySQLDatabase: authme
  mySQLPort: '3306'
  mySQLColumnIp: ip
  mySQLHost: 127.0.0.1
  mySQLColumnPassword: password
  mySQLPassword: '12345'
  caching: true
  mySQLlastlocX: x
  mySQLlastlocY: y
  mySQLlastlocZ: z
  mySQLColumnEmail: email
  mySQLColumnId: id
GroupOptions:
  UnregisteredPlayerGroup: ''
  RegisteredPlayerGroup: ''
  Permissions:
    PermissionsOnJoin: []
settings:
  sessions:
    enabled: false
    timeout: 60
  restrictions:
    allowChat: false
    allowCommands:
    - /login
    - /register
    - /l
    - /reg
    - /passpartu
    - /email
    maxRegPerIp: 1
    maxNicknameLength: 20
    ForceSingleSession: true
    ForceSpawnLocOnJoinEnabled: false
    SaveQuitLocation: false
    AllowRestrictedUser: false
    AllowedRestrictedUser: []
    kickNonRegistered: false
    kickOnWrongPassword: false
    teleportUnAuthedToSpawn: true
    minNicknameLength: 3
    allowMovement: false
    timeout: 60
    allowedNicknameCharacters: '[a-zA-Z0-9_?]*'
    allowedMovementRadius: 100
    enablePasswordVerifier: true
    ProtectInventoryBeforeLogIn: true
    displayOtherAccounts: true
  GameMode:
    ForceSurvivalMode: false
    ResetInventoryIfCreative: false
  security:
    minPasswordLength: 4
    unLoggedinGroup: unLoggedinGroup
    passwordHash: SHA256
    passwordMaxLength: 20
  registration:
    enabled: true
    messageInterval: 5
    force: true
  unrestrictions:
    UnrestrictedName: []
  messagesLanguage: en
ExternalBoardOptions:
  mySQLColumnSalt: ''
  mySQLColumnGroup: ''
  nonActivedUserGroup: -1
  mySQLOtherUsernameColumns: []
Xenoforo:
  predefinedSalt: ''
permission:
  EnablePermissionCheck: false
BackupSystem:
  ActivateBackup: false
  OnServerStart: false
  OnServerStop: true
  MysqlWindowsPath: C:\\Program Files\\MySQL\\MySQL Server 5.1\\
Passpartu:
  enablePasspartu: false
Security:
  SQLProblem:
    stopServer: true
  ReloadCommand:
    useReloadCommandSupport: true
  console:
    noConsoleSpam: false
    removePassword: true
Converter:
  Rakamak:
    fileName: users.rak
    useIP: false
    ipFileName: UsersIp.rak
    newPasswordHash: SHA256
    useIp: false
Email:
  mailSMTP: smtp.gmail.com
  mailPort: 465
  mailAccount: ''
  mailPassword: ''
  mailSenderName: ''
  RecoveryPasswordLength: 8

ttc_V 发表于 2015-5-31 21:07
我的也是172的我的配置如下你复制粘贴就OK
DataSource:
  mySQLColumnName: username
问题貌似是解决了。但是后台会出现这个情况
